description: Bobby Williams spies Filippo Romano in an open air shower.  Musclestud Filippo pulls Bobby in and the men eagerly explore their taut forms as the water streams over them.  Each takes a turn sucking, nibbling, rimming, and probing the other - feeding their desires and transporting the studs into a steamy state of erotic reverie.
title: Drenched, Part 2:  Soaked To The Bone
